creator: mwiede@gmx.de
text:
We need jsch-0.1.54 because we need aes256-ctr as cipher.

As you can see in http://www.jcraft.com/jsch/ChangeLog, they added it with version 0.1.51

btw I was talking about dependency of

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.ant</groupId>
    <artifactId>ant-jsch</artifactId>
    <version>1.10.1</version>
</dependency>
creator: mwiede@gmx.de
jaikiran@apache.org
text: Pull request sent for review https://github.com/apache/ant/pull/48

creator: jaikiran@apache.org
text: The library has been upgraded to 0.1.54 and the change will be available in 1.9.10 and 1.10.2 releases.
